channel.title: Phone Cell War Matiss Taiwan Hiromi Ella on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Cell War Matiss Taiwan Hiromi Ella on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: good morning.. or not
item.description: today I woke up on the wrong side of the bed.. which is incredibly hard.. since there is a wall in the way.. but however I managed it.. I am totally backwards and screwed up today. it is a pain. first off I locked myself out of my apartment.. I wasn’t even ready to leave.. but I left.. then realized I didn’t have anything but my cell phone.. so I was able to call and wake matiss to have him let me in.
